channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hundreds of unaccompanied Guatemalan children can stay in the U.S. for now, judge says
item.description: A federal district judge issued a temporary restraining order after the U.S. attempted to deport hundreds of unaccompanied Guatemalan children without...

item.title: Guatemala says it suggested that U.S. send its unaccompanied migrant children home
item.description: As a U.S. federal judge blocked the deportation of unaccompanied Guatemalan children, the government of Guatemala says in a statement it suggested the...

item.title: Rudy Giuliani hospitalized after car crash in New Hampshire

item.title: Artists turning trash into masterpieces
item.description: As climate concerns take center stage, repurposed art is getting more wall space and less side-eye from the art world. Itay Hod reports.

item.title: 8/31: Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan

item.title: 8/27: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: How the Minneapolis shooting unfolded; Reporter's Notebook: The price children pay for inaction on gun violence

item.title: Judge blocks deportation of Guatemalan migrant children as flights were ready to take
item.description: The plaintiffs in this case are 10 migrant children between the ages of 10 and 17 who entered the U.S. without authorization and without their parents...

item.title: Friday night football brings healing in Kerrville
item.description: Still recovering from devastating July flash flooding, the Kerrville community gathered for the Texas tradition of high school football Friday night. ...

item.title: Chicago's mayor pushes back as Trump administration readies immigration crackdown
item.description: Brandon Johnson signed an executive order barring the city's police from collaborating with federal officers on civil immigration enforcement operatio...

item.title: Rudy Giuliani hospitalized with broken vertebra after car accident, spokesperson says
item.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani has been hospitalized with a broken vertebra after a car accident in New Hampshire, according to his spokespe...

item.title: UK closes embassy in Cairo amid row over activist's arrest
item.description: The removal of the barriers is widely seen as retaliation for the arrest of a pro-Egyptian government activist in London last week.

item.title: Head-on crash between police van and prison bus kills 16 in Namibia
item.description: Fourteen prison and police officers, along with two civilians, were killed in the crash.

item.title: 'I fear for my sons': Mother awaits DNA results on remains linked to Kenya's starvation cult
item.description: Carolyne Odour's two young sons went missing with their father - a follower of self-proclaimed pastor Paul Mackenzie.

item.title: Hamas spokesman Abu Obeida killed in Gaza, Israel says
item.description: The military spokesman was killed in strikes on Saturday, Israel says - Hamas has not confirmed the death.

item.title: Former NYC Mayor Rudy Giuliani injured in car accident
item.description: The former Trump adviser's car was struck from behind on a highway in New Hampshire, a statement said.
